00016 // DeltaCorrInputRef class definition
00017 // serves as common reference
00019 
00020 class DeltaCorrInputRef
00021         : public ConfigBase
00022         , public ManageableInput
00023 {
00024     friend std::ofstream & operator<<(std::ofstream & os, const DeltaCorrInputRef & cir);
00025 public:
00027 
00030     typedef CorrInputMech<DeltaCorrInputRef> related_component;
00031 
00033     MAKE_VISITABLE(DeltaCorrInputRef)
00034 
00035 public:
00036 //  DeltaCorrInputRef(double base_rate, double correlation);
00037     DeltaCorrInputRef(std::ifstream & is);
00038     inline const double & rate_when_not_correlated() const {
00039         return rate_when_not_correlated_;
00040     }
00041     inline const double & rate_when_correlated() const {
00042         return rate_when_correlated_;
00043     }
00044     const bool & correlated_event_state() const;
00045 private:
00046     void input_update();
00047     double base_rate_;
00048     double correlation_;
00049     double rate_when_not_correlated_, rate_when_correlated_;
00050     bool correlated_event_state_;
00051 };

00056 // CorrInputRefShiftedCopy class definition
00057 // serves as common reference
00059 
00060 class CorrInputRefShiftedCopy
00061         : public ConfigBase
00062         , public ManageableInput
00063 {
00064     friend std::ofstream & operator<<(std::ofstream & os, const CorrInputRefShiftedCopy & cirsc);
00065 public:
00067 
00070     typedef CorrInputMech<CorrInputRefShiftedCopy> related_component;
00071 
00073     MAKE_VISITABLE(CorrInputRefShiftedCopy)
00074 
00075 public:
00076 //  CorrInputRefShiftedCopy(DeltaCorrInputRef * reference, unsigned delay_in_timestep);
00077     CorrInputRefShiftedCopy(std::ifstream & is);
00078     ~CorrInputRefShiftedCopy();
00079     inline const double & rate_when_not_correlated() const {
00080         return reference_->rate_when_not_correlated();
00081     }
00082     inline const double & rate_when_correlated() const {
00083         return reference_->rate_when_correlated();
00084     }
00085     inline const unsigned & delay_in_timestep() const {
00086         return delay_in_timestep_;
00087     }
00088     const bool & correlated_event_state() const;
00089 private:
00090     void input_update();
00091     DeltaCorrInputRef * reference_;
00092     Size delay_in_timestep_, index_;
00093     bool * correlated_event_state_list_;
00094 };

00097 
00099 // inline definitions
00101 
00103 // updates the correlation state of a correlated group neuron
00104 inline void DeltaCorrInputRef::input_update()
00105 {
00106     if (RandomGenerator::probability_trial_for_time_step(base_rate_)) // same rate as base rate
00107         correlated_event_state_ = true;
00108     else
00109         correlated_event_state_ = false;
00110 }
00111 
00113 // updates the correlation state of a correlated group neuron
00114 inline const bool & DeltaCorrInputRef::correlated_event_state() const
00115 {
00116     return correlated_event_state_;
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00121 // updates the correlation state of a correlated group neuron
00122 inline void CorrInputRefShiftedCopy::input_update()
00123 {
00124     // retrieve the state of the reference
00125     correlated_event_state_list_[index_] = reference_->correlated_event_state();
00126     // move the index forward (and go back beginning of cycle if needed)
00127     ++index_;
00128     if (index_ > delay_in_timestep_) index_ = 0;
00129 }
00130 
00132 // updates the correlation state of a correlated group neuron
00133 inline const bool & CorrInputRefShiftedCopy::correlated_event_state() const
00134 {
00135     return correlated_event_state_list_[index_];
00136 }
